description:
1. Just import the modules and only look at nova.flags.FLAGS when they're all imported
2. ConfigOpts is iterable, there should be no need to iterate the private FLAGS._opts dict
3. Output should be .ini style
4. The output should only contain comments
   i.e. each option default should be commented out
title: Nova options tool enhancements

comments.content:
1. Just import the modules and only look at nova.flags.FLAGS when they're all imported
2. ConfigOpts is iterable, there should be no need to iterate the private FLAGS._opts dict
3. Output should be .ini style
4. The output should only contain comments
     i.e. each option default should be commented out
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zyluo

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/4347
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/cce1c217eb39998c5390d37ba61f2c7f0056b25e
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit cce1c217eb39998c5390d37ba61f2c7f0056b25e
Author: Zhongyue Luo <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 21 20:50:08 2012 +0800

    Nova options tool enhancements
    
    Fixes bug #936898
    
    1. Just import the modules and only look at nova.flags.FLAGS
       when they're all imported
    
    2. ConfigOpts is iterable, there should be no need to iterate
       the private FLAGS._opts dict
    
    3. Output should be .ini style
    
    4. The output should only contain comments
       i.e. each option default should be commented out
    
    Change-Id: I15835bb437bc6d575e8311d7c55b3a29d67b006d
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
